title: Saturday results
text:
Monday, October 12, 2015 1:05 AM EDT 
Saturday results BOYS SOCCERSHEPAUG 1, THOMASTON 0Goals: S—Connor Douskey 1; Assists: S—Alan Stinson 1; Saves: Clayton Schneider 9; T—Anthony Faschini 17.
